name: Misty Lake Ice Skate
description:
Misty Lake Ice Skate

Submission for the Touhou Jam 10 (Winter Games). 

Go for a relaxing skate on the Misty Lake with Cirno as she freezes over the water with her powers. Collect Cirno's favorite treats, cakes and ice cream (she probably would like those).

Together with Heathersward and SuitePea, we all teamed up to create a 3D game with ice skating as our main focus. 

We had 72 (+24) hours to finish, with a one day extension. 

Credits:

HapsJits:

Responsible for game design & all programming  

Heathersward:

Modeled, created and animated all 3D characters and environments.

SuitePea:

Composed the music for the game

Additional Credits:

Allsky Free (Skybox)

Lowpoly Water Shader (Water)

textures.com (Environment textures)

Freesound (SFX)

Thank you for reading and enjoy the game!

(1hr post jam update: Added something after collecting all food and adjusted music)
